title: Magic Wand

fields.name: 🔥 Phlogiston:
fields.value: Apply Burn 5 to the enemy for the rest of the battle.

fields.name: ❄️ Cryogen:
fields.value: Chill the enemy, reducing its next attack by an amount equal to its remaining HP.

fields.name: ☁️ Atmosphere:
fields.value:
Grant yourself a 20% dodge chance for the rest of the battle.

Every enemy you defeat with this weapon equipped will drop one unit of elemental material in addition to its usual loot.

desc:
*Aggressive unintelligible gibberish.*

When equipped, deals 7-16 damage and allows you to harness the hidden power within elemental materials in battle.
